We are on an ongoing journey to become a more diverse and inclusive organization that recruits, develops, and retains a workforce representative 
of the global communities we serve. This journey requires deliberate and consistent action to address longstanding challenges and bring us to a 
better place, together. Beyond Amgen, we are engaging with business and other community leaders, government officials, and external partners
